Izumo uses [[Water Release: Starch Syrup Capturing Field]] to create a big pool of water, after which, he, alongside Asuma and Kotetsu, moulds with the water in order to get close to their opponent. The three then jump out of the water and strike the opponent behind their back, with Izumo and Kotetsu delivering an attack with a [[Kunai Blade|long kunai]] and a [[Conch Shell Mace|mace]] simultaneously, followed with Asuma striking the opponent with his [[Flying Swallow]]-enhanced [[Chakra Blade]]. After that, Shikamaru uses his [[Shadow Gathering Technique]] to pull his teammates in, allowing Kotetsu and Izumo to attack the opponent once more, creating a pillar of water, which hardens after the blow, followed with Asuma slashing through the pillar and the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* A jōseki is a term for a well established strategy or tactic in [[wikipedia:shōgi|shōgi]] and [[wikipedia:go (game)|go]].
